mapper.select: SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO , A.SRA_SRS_DSC , A.FHS_ID_NO , A.FARM_AMNNO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.BIRTH), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTH , A.MCOW_DSC , A.KPN_NO , A.INDV_SEX_C , A.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO , A.MATIME , A.SRA_INDV_PASG_QCN , A.INDV_ID_NO , A.SRA_INDV_BRDSRA_RG_NO , A.RG_DSC , A.ANW_YN , A.FSRG_DTM , A.FSRGMN_ENO , A.LSCHG_DTM , A.LS_CMENO , B.FTSNM , B.DONGUP , B.DONGBW , B.OHSE_TELNO , B.CUS_MPNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{na_bzplc} AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = #{sra_indv_amnno}

SELECT AUC_DT , NA_BZPLC , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AUC_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YY.MM.DD') AUC_DT_STR , AGGR_CONCAT (AUC_OBJ_DSC, ',') AS AUC_OBJ_DSC FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_QCN WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND DEL_YN = 0 AND AUC_DT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_DT ORDER BY AUC_DT DESC

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_DT , A.QCN , A.SGNO_PRC_DSC , A.CUT_AM , A.DDL_YN , A.TMS_YN , A.DEL_YN , A.MALE_KG , A.FEMALE_KG , A.TT_SCR , A.FSRG_DTM , A.FSRGMN_ENO , A.LSCHG_DTM , A.LS_CMENO , CASE WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '1' THEN ROUND(A.BASE_LMT_AM / NVL(C.CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM, 10000)) WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '2' THEN ROUND(A.BASE_LMT_AM / NVL(C.NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM, 1)) WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '3' THEN ROUND(A.BASE_LMT_AM / NVL(C.PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM, 10000)) ELSE A.BASE_LMT_AM END AS BASE_LMT_AM , A.BASE_LMT_AM AS BASE_LMT_AM_ORI , CASE WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '1' THEN C.CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '2' THEN C.NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '3' THEN C.PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM ELSE 10000 END AS DIVISION_PRICE , C.CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM AS DIVISION_PRICE1 , C.NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM AS DIVISION_PRICE2 , C.PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM AS DIVISION_PRICE3 FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_QCN A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_ENV_EST C ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{aucDt} AND ( A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '0' OR A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{aucObjDsc} )

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , NVL(C.AUC_DT, #{auc_dt}) AS AUC_DT , NVL(C.AUC_OBJ_DSC, #{auc_obj_dsc}) AS AUC_OBJ_DSC , E.SIMP_CNM AS AUC_OBJ_DSCNM , C.OSLP_NO , C.LED_SQNO , NVL(C.AUC_PRG_SQ, (SELECT NVL(MAX(AUC_PRG_SQ)+1, 1) FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{aucDt})) AS AUC_PRG_SQ , A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO , A.SRA_SRS_DSC , A.FHS_ID_NO , A.FARM_AMNNO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.BIRTH), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTH , A.MCOW_DSC , A.KPN_NO , A.INDV_SEX_C , F.SIMP_CNM AS INDV_SEX_CNM , A.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO , A.MATIME , A.SRA_INDV_PASG_QCN , A.INDV_ID_NO , A.SRA_INDV_BRDSRA_RG_NO , A.RG_DSC , A.ANW_YN , A.FSRG_DTM , A.FSRGMN_ENO , A.LSCHG_DTM , A.LS_CMENO , B.FTSNM , B.DONGUP , B.DONGBW , B.OHSE_TELNO , B.CUS_MPNO , B.NA_TRPL_C , NVL(C.SOGMN_C, B.FHS_ID_NO) AS SOGMN_C , NVL(C.SRA_PDMNM, B.FTSNM) AS SRA_PDMNM , NVL(C.SRA_PD_RGNNM, B.DONGUP) AS SRA_PD_RGNNM , NVL(C.TRPCS_PY_YN, '1') AS TRPCS_PY_YN , C.COW_SOG_WT , C.RMK_CNTN , DECODE(#{auc_obj_dsc}, '3', C.PPGCOW_FEE_DSC, '5') AS PPGCOW_FEE_DSC , C.AFISM_MOD_DT , C.PRNY_MTCN , C.PRNY_YN , C.MOD_KPN_NO , C.NCSS_JUG_YN , CASE WHEN TRIM(C.AFISM_MOD_DT) IS NULL THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.AFISM_MOD_DT,'YYYYMMDD')+ 285,'YYYYMMDD') END AS PTUR_PLA_DT , CASE WHEN NVL(C.AUC_OBJ_DSC, #{auc_obj_dsc}) = '1' THEN ROUND(C.FIR_LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM/D.CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM) WHEN NVL(C.AUC_OBJ_DSC, #{auc_obj_dsc}) = '2' THEN ROUND(C.FIR_LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM/D.NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM) WHEN NVL(C.AUC_OBJ_DSC, #{auc_obj_dsc}) = '3' THEN ROUND(C.FIR_LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM/D.PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM) ELSE ROUND(C.FIR_LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM/10000) END AS FIR_LOWS_SBID_LMT_UPR , C.FIR_LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , CASE WHEN NVL(C.AUC_OBJ_DSC, #{auc_obj_dsc}) = '1' THEN ROUND(C.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM/D.CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM) WHEN NVL(C.AUC_OBJ_DSC, #{auc_obj_dsc}) = '2' THEN ROUND(C.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM/D.NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM) WHEN NVL(C.AUC_OBJ_DSC, #{auc_obj_dsc}) = '3' THEN ROUND(C.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM/D.PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM) ELSE ROUND(C.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM/10000) END AS LOWS_SBID_LMT_UPR , C.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , CASE WHEN NVL(C.AUC_OBJ_DSC, #{auc_obj_dsc}) = '1' THEN D.CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM WHEN NVL(C.AUC_OBJ_DSC, #{auc_obj_dsc}) = '2' THEN D.NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM WHEN NVL(C.AUC_OBJ_DSC, #{auc_obj_dsc}) = '3' THEN D.PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM ELSE 10000 END AS DIVISION_PRICE , C.SEL_STS_DSC , C.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , C.SRA_SBID_UPR FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW C ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND C.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND C.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} ) INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_ENV_EST D ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL E ON ( E.SIMP_TPC = 'AUC_OBJ_DSC' AND E.SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' AND NVL(C.AUC_OBJ_DSC, #{auc_obj_dsc}) = E.SIMP_C ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL F ON ( F.SIMP_TPC = 'INDV_SEX_C' AND F.SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' AND A.INDV_SEX_C = F.SIMP_C ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{na_bzplc} AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = #{sra_indv_amnno}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LSCHG_DTM DESC) AS NUM , SEL_STS_DSC , CASE WHEN SEL_STS_DSC = '11' THEN '송장등록' WHEN SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN '낙찰' WHEN SEL_STS_DSC = '23' THEN '유찰' ELSE '' END SEL_STS_DSC_NM , SRA_SBID_UPR , LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , (SELECT SRA_MWMNNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN B WHERE B.NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC AND B.TRMN_AMNNO = A.TRMN_AMNNO) AS SRA_MWMNNM , (SELECT USRNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_USR B WHERE B.NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC AND B.ENO = A.LS_CMENO) AS USRNM , LS_CMENO , TO_CHAR(LSCHG_DTM, 'HH24:MI') AS CHG_HM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW_LOG A WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = '1' AND AUC_DT = #{aucDt} AND OSLP_NO = #{oslpNo} AND LED_SQNO = '1'
AND SRA_INDV_AMNNO = #{sraIndvAmnno} ) C WHERE NUM < 4

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.TRMN_AMNNO , A.MWMN_NA_TRPL_C , A.SRA_MWMNNM , A.FRLNO , A.ZIP , A.DONGUP , A.DONGBW , A.OHSE_TELNO , A.CUS_MPNO , A.MACO_YN , A.JRDWO_DSC , A.PSN_INF_OFR_AGR_YN , A.TMS_YN , A.DEL_YN , A.RMK_CNTN , A.CUS_RLNO , A.FSRG_DTM , A.FSRGMN_ENO , A.LSCHG_DTM , A.LS_CMENO , A.SMS_NO , A.SMS_YMD , A.MB_INTG_NO , B.AUC_DT , B.AUC_OBJ_DSC , B.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = B.TRMN_AMNNO AND B.AUC_DT = #{aucDt} AND B.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{qcnAucObjDsc} AND B.DEL_YN = '0') WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.SRA_MWMNNM = #{sraMwmnnm} AND A.CUS_RLNO = #{cusRlno} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_DT , AUC_OBJ_DSC , LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , TRMN_AMNNO , TR_DFN_YN , AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM , RTRN_YN , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , ATTC_NO FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{aucDt} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{qcnAucObjDsc} AND LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO = #{lvstAucPtcMnNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO)+1, 1) FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{aucDt}
INSERT INTO TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR ( NA_BZPLC , AUC_DT , AUC_OBJ_DSC , LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , TRMN_AMNNO , TR_DFN_YN , AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM , RTRN_YN , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , ATTC_NO ) SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_DT , AUC_OBJ_DSC , #{lvstAucPtcMnNo} , #{trmnAmnno} , '0' , 0 , '0' , '0' , '0' , SYSDATE , #{lsCmeno} , SYSDATE , #{lsCmeno} , NULL FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_QCN WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{aucDt}
mapper.select: SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SRA_INDV_AMNNO , IMG_SQNO , FILE_PATH , FILE_NM , FILE_EXT_NM , 'https://kr.object.ncloudstorage.com/test-tt12/'||FILE_PATH||FILE_NM||FILE_EXT_NM AS FILE_URL , 'https://kr.object.ncloudstorage.com/test-tt12/'||FILE_PATH||'thumb/'||FILE_NM||FILE_EXT_NM AS THUMB_FILE_URL , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_COW_IMG WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND SRA_INDV_AMNNO = #{sra_indv_amnno} ORDER BY IMG_SQNO ASC
